short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to scan any token address and check if it is a honeypot or not. A product of 0xHew.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Hew Scanner, a powerful extension designed to enhance your browsing experience on platforms like https://bscscan.com and https://etherscan.io. With Hew Scanner, you can effortlessly scan token addresses and detect potential honeypots in just a few clicks. Here's how it works:

Read URL: Hew Scanner seamlessly extracts the URL from BscScan or Etherscan, ensuring a smooth scanning process.

Token Address Extraction: Once the URL is obtained, Hew Scanner automatically retrieves the token address, eliminating the need for manual input.

Honeypot Detection: Hew Scanner leverages the Honeypot.is API to thoroughly analyze the token address for any potential honeypot risks. This advanced scanning process provides you with valuable insights and helps protect your investments.

User-Friendly Results: After scanning, Hew Scanner promptly delivers the scan results back to the user interface (UI). The results are presented in a clear and easy-to-understand format, enabling you to make informed decisions regarding token investments.

Hew Scanner simplifies the process of identifying potential honeypots, offering you a convenient solution to stay safe while navigating the world of cryptocurrencies.
